title: Hubbell Trading Post National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Special Use Permits    Professional Photography/Filming Permits are issued for photography, filming, and associated sound recording to ensure protection of Hubbell Trading Post resources. To prevent significant disruption of normal visitor uses, or when they involve props, models, professional crews and casts or set dressings. Permits are required for areas normally closed to the visiting public. Application for Special Park Use    Film/Photography Permit Application
